typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		Postinumero as string,
		Talotyyppi as string,
		Rakennusvuosi as string,
		Vuosi as string,
		Neliohinta as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Postinro as string,
		{Postinumeroalueen nimi} as string,
		Kuntakoodi as string,
		{Kunnan nimi} as string,
		Kuntaryhmakoodi as string,
		{Kuntaryhman nimi} as string,
		Seutukuntakoodi as string,
		{Seutukunnan nimi} as string,
		Maakuntakoodi as string,
		{Maakunnan nimi} as string,
		Suuraluekoodi as string,
		{Suuralueen nimi} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source2 select(mapColumn(
		Postinro,
		Postinumeroalueen_nimi = {Postinumeroalueen nimi},
		Kunnan_nimi = {Kunnan nimi}
	)) ~> Select1
source1, Select1 join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
